getFeatureFileReader

public static FeatureFileReader getFeatureFileReader(java.lang.String fileName)
                                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                                     MaryConfigurationException
Get a feature file reader representing the given feature file.

Parameters:
fileName - the filename of a valid feature file.
Returns:
a feature file object representing the given file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was a problem reading the file
MaryConfigurationException - if the file is not a valid feature file.
